examples.example: 刚才我遇到了一位热心的陌生人，他帮我解决了一个大难题。

translate.english: Just now I met a warm-hearted stranger who helped me solve a big problem.

examples.example: 刚才我看到了美丽的彩虹，心情一下子变得格外愉悦。

translate.english: Just now I saw the beautiful rainbow, and my mood suddenly became extremely pleasant.

examples.example: 刚才我听到了一个好消息，让我一整天都充满了活力。

translate.english: Just now I heard a good news, which made me full of energy all day long.
